title.narrative: Remote audit and verification practices to facilitate food trade

description.narrative: 1. UNIDO has received a preparatory project grant from STDF to further investigate and develop a pilot initiative on remote inspection practices of food regulators (SAP ID: 200314). As part of this grant UNIDO has developed a survey for the SPS Committee to investigate current remote practices by auditors, regulators and the food industry. UNIDO's technical expertise in this domain along raised the interest of the Department of Agriculture, Water and the Environment as acting Codex Committee on Food Import and Export Certification and Inspection (CCFICS) Chair and also Chair of the Codex electronic working group on Remote audit and verification in regulatory frameworks. 2. Due to UNIDO's engagement in remote inspection and internal know-how on digital transformation and food safety, DAWE has approached UNIDO to indicate its interest for a scope of work on assessing current remote audit practices in selected South East Asian countries and also in the ASEAN region. Australia also indicated its interest to provide additional support to the Vienna Food Safety Forum 2022 which would run under the motto of "Data Driven Innovations in Food Safety". 3. Australia pledged its financial support for the aforementioned activities which would help also the ongoing Codex work and support a more inclusive standard-setting proc
